articles.description: Just two weeks after making his final Melbourne Storm appearance in the NRL grand final, rugby convert Suliasi Vunivalu is set to join the Wallabies for the remainder of their Tri-Nations campaign.
articles.content:
According to the Sydney Morning Herald, the Fijian flyer will join the squad in their Hunter Valley camp on Wednesday afternoon if cleared of COVID-19.
But the report states it is extremely unlikely… [+1876 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: 'How about backing the guy?' Pearce leaps to Cleary's defence - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: For years, Mitchell Pearce was the definitive punching bag for NSW supporters. Now, Nathan Cleary is starting to cop similar blows as the Blues fight for survival in game two.
articles.content:
They're admirable comments from Pearce, although the criticism directed at Cleary hasn't reached Pearce-like proportions just yet.
In many respects, it can also be justified. In the grand final for … [+4496 chars]

articles.title: State of Origin game II preview: match time, kick off, team lists - NRL.COM
articles.description: After being written off by all and sundry leading into game one, the Maroons now head to Sydney with the chance to wrap up the series following an upset.
articles.content:
After being written off by all and sundry going into game one, the Maroons head to Sydney with the chance to wrap up the Ampol State of Origin series.
